scripts.minify-js: plop=$(minify src/common.js | sed 's/"/\\\\"/g');sed "/\/\/ commonjs-start/,/\/\/ commonjs-end/{/^  \/\/ common/!d;};" src/html.cpp -i && sed "/\/\/ commonjs-start/,/\/\/ commonjs-end/c\  \/\/ commonjs-start\n  return \"$plop\";\n  \/\/ commonjs-end" src/html.cpp -i
scripts.minify-css: plop=$(minify src/common.css | sed 's/"/\\\\"/g');sed "/\/\/ commoncss-start/,/\/\/ commoncss-end/{/^  \/\/ common/!d;};" src/html.cpp -i && sed "/\/\/ commoncss-start/,/\/\/ commoncss-end/c\  \/\/ commoncss-start\n  return \"$plop\";\n  \/\/ commoncss-end" src/html.cpp -i
